rules_text:
Endless Parasite’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.
Reborn 1–{5}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
